tree.name: Jordan Walsh
tree.tradeDescription: Celtics traded Colby Jones to Sacramento for Jordan Walsh and a 2024 2nd round pick
tree.note: 2023 2nd round pick (38th overall) by Sacramento from Arkansas

assetsGivenUp.name: Colby Jones
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics traded James Nnaji to Charlotte for Mouhamed Gueye and Colby Jones

assetsGivenUp.name: James Nnaji
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Celtics traded Marcus Sasser to Detroit for James Nnaji, 2025 2nd and 2026 2nd

assetsGivenUp.name: Marcus Sasser
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Part of Marcus Smart/Kristaps Porzingis 3-team trade. Celtics sent Smart to Memphis, received Sasser and 2024 1st
assetsGivenUp.note: Draft rights acquired in blockbuster Porzingis trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Marcus Smart
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Drafted by Celtics with their OWN pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Heart and Soul of the 2024 Championship team (traded after that run). DPOY 2022. Celtics own pick - TRUE ORIGIN
